entries.english: NJ prefix (a,e,c,u,o verbs): ĩta→Njĩtagwo, aria→Njaragia, eterera→Njetereraga, ceera→Njeraga, ũga→Njũgaga. NG prefix (g,ng,k verbs): kena→Ngenaga, kora→Ngoraga, koma→Ngomaga. NY prefix (o,e,ny,um,un,en verbs): anđĩka→Nyanđĩkaga, ũma→Nyũmaga, ona→Nyõnaga, enja→Nyenjaga, nyua→Nyũaga. MB prefix (b verbs): batara→Mbataraga. Irregular: rĩma→Nĩmaga (reason unclear). R-verbs without N: rota→nđotaga, ruga→nđugaga

2nd Singular: ũgũ-ũka (you will come), ũkũ-rĩa (you will eat), ũgũ-theka (you will laugh). 2nd Plural: Mũgũ-ũka (you will come), Mũkũ-rĩa (you will eat), Mũgũ-theka (you will laugh). 3rd Singular: egũka (he/she will come), ekũrĩa (he/she will eat), agũthooma (he/she will read). 3rd Plural: megũka (they will come), mekũrĩa (they will eat), magũthooma (they will read)
